name: The Kidnap
description:
You are a robot and with your robot friends from your small planet, you come to Earth and want to invade an area to create a new base for your own colony. However, it turns out that the server from your planet that controls you all, the robots, accidentally get shut down and all of you are get affected by the server. A psychopath passes and kidnaps all of you and brings you to the underground motel.  After a while, your planet's server has rebooted and you wake up but your friends have been hacked by the psycho and have become your enemies. Now, you only have 5 minutes before running out of battery and you have to go back and recharge your spaceship to report your headquarters by collecting batteries that fall along the way when psycho carrying all of you.

This project was created for assignment purpose. All assets are captured from Free Unreal Engine Assets and Royalty Free Assets.
